resources.string: You can only stack the cats in a single vertical line.\10Once you have placed a cat, you can not change the position so carry on stacking.\10The cats are sized S / M / L.\10It is important to tilt your GALAXY to take balance, but you need to be careful not to over do it!

Set the GALAXY on its side and FACE OFF for a cat-stacking battle!\10On the start signal, start stacking your cats side by side on each of your screens!\10Just remember, you can\'t tilt to balance in an GALAXY battle! So stack carefully...\10The game ends when both of your towers have fallen down.\10The player with the highest tower of cats is the WINNER! Have fun everyone.
Got a good personal best? Send it to the global rankings! (Applies only to personal bests over 5m)
Got a twitter account? Try tweeting from the scores screen. You can tweet your daily stack scores like this: Today I stacked xx cats. That\'s a total of xx cats stacked!\10#mmt_toy
If nickname is not registered, the ranking transmission cannot be done.\10Please register nickname by the option.
Please input nickname within the DBCS 10 characters and the SBCS 20 characters.
There is play data that can be transmitted.\10Do you transmit?(It is updated when there is a high score.)
Fail sending score! Try send on next game.
Today I stacked $TODAY_NUM$. That is a total of $TOTAL_NUM$ $TOTAL_HEIGHT$ stacked!
Memory empty. Try restart this application？
Please look forward to the next campaign!
Been transmitted.\10Please look forward to the arrival of the goods!
Please contact our\10「au つみネコプレゼント係」\10info@b3united.com
Personal information you enter will be strictly controlled by the Company, will not be used for any purpose other than sending gifts.
